extendedInfo.description: If you are Chris Brown's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Chris Brown's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Chris Brown's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Chris Brown's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Chris Brown- Exclusive- Graffiti- F.A.M.E.- Fortune-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - 2012- 100 Bottles- 100%- 2 Complicated- 2 Young 2 Give A Fuck- 4 Years Old- 48 reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is cool and awesome

reviews.title: chris brown lyrics
reviews.comment: What is this? You try to look at lyrics, and you get? an advertise. BEST APP...  YEAH SURE... I personally like chris brown, but you have to remove those adverts. Thats my opinion. 3 stars only because the design looks good.
